body.p: The Aggregator Reactor will sometimes be installed over existing conduit in a concrete 􀏐loor and the position of the conduit may not match the unit’s cable entry panels. To accommodate the spacing of existing conduit, an optional Side Car provides more cable entry space.
The Side Car has removable side panels allowing it to be attached to either side of an Aggregator Reactor.

li.p: On the sides to be joined together:
On the Aggregator Reactor, remove the top and bottom side panels.
On the Side Car, remove the top and bottom side panels.
li.note: Side Car side panels can be removed from either side to make a Left-Hand or Right-Hand Side Car.

li.p: Move the Side Car up against the Aggregator Reactor so that edges and holes align.
Bolt units together at (4) bolt locations (2 upper, 2 lower) in the upper and lower frames.
Secure the Side Car to the 􀏐loor using customer-provided ½" hardware as for the Aggregator Reactor.
